alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Webster; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 6:05PM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Webster County in north central Mississippi... Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 605 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Houston to 7 miles west of Center Ridge, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Millcreek around 620 PM CDT. Betheden around 625 PM CDT. Craig Springs around 630 PM CDT. Oktoc and Longview around 635 PM CDT. Starkville around 640 PM CDT. Sessums around 645 PM CDT. Tibbee and Muldrow around 650 PM CDT. West Point around 655 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mantee and Sturgis. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central, north central, northeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Choctaw; Clay; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Webster; Winston
